title: [Bug]: Fedora RPM packages are way behind
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Fedora RPM packages are way behind latest version

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

latest

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
❯ sudo yum update
Updating and loading repositories:
Repositories loaded.
Nothing to do.

❯ sudo yum install teams-for-linux
Updating and loading repositories:
Repositories loaded.
Package "teams-for-linux-1.13.0-1.x86_64" is already installed.
```

```
 sudo dnf install ~/Downloads/teams-for-linux-2.1.0.x86_64.rpm
Updating and loading repositories:
Repositories loaded.
Package                                                                                 Arch               Version                                                                                 Repository                                              Size
Upgrading:
 teams-for-linux                                                                        x86_64             2.1.0-1                                                                                 @commandline                                       303.8 MiB
   replacing teams-for-linux                                                            x86_64             1.13.0-1                                                                                @commandline                                       283.8 MiB

Transaction Summary:
 Upgrading:          1 package
 Replacing:          1 package
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
It should install latest version
```

### Additional context

_No response_
